title: Charming Boutique Escape on Tasmaniaâ€™s Southern Coast
description: Leave the city lights behind and venture just 20 minutes out of Hobart for a romantic escape at Villa Howden, a boutique hotel with ten luxury suites located on the tranquil shores of North West Bay. Relax and unwind in this charming retreat as you enjoy daily continental breakfast, a bottle of sparkling on arrival and a guaranteed, leisurely late 12pm checkout.
